name: consulta_cep
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool consulta_cnpj_tempo_real.
Tool description: API Tempo Real de Consultas a Receita Federal, Simples Nacional e Cadastro de Contribuintes (SINTEGRA).
API description: Fetches information about a given CEP (Postal Code) using the RapidAPI service.

cep.description: The Brazilian postal code (CEP) to be queried.
